attributes.action: Place all the 150 new walk in health polyclinics centrally in all cities and towns so that they are easily accessible to everybody
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In our city all the county and city buses radiate to a central point but it is suggested by some that the new polyclinic is placed outside the city which means that one bus will be needed to the city and another to the polyclinic. Obviously all new Health Polyclinics should be centrally situated to be easily accessible to everybody.
